definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: One hot steak on a sizzlin' platter.
sentences.chinese: 一份热牛排，还在盘子里咝咝作响呢。

sentences.english: The plates are barred with blue stripes round the edge .
sentences.chinese: 盘子的边上点缀着蓝边。

sentences.english: Lots of spaghetti on a big big plate.
sentences.chinese: 很多意大利面在一个大盘子里。

sentences.english: The dishwasher sponged off the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 洗碗机把那些盘子洗了。

sentences.english: The waiter came out with a tray with five bowls of noodles on it.
sentences.chinese: 服务员端了一个盘子出来，上面有五碗面。

sentences.english: Kindly note we have demand for a tray and we ask you to send your best quotation.
sentences.chinese: 请注意我们需要盘子，我们要求你们给出最好的时价。

sentences.english: Jesus replied, "The one who has dipped his hand into the bowl with me will betray me.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣回答说，同我蘸手在盘子里的，就是他要卖我。

sentences.english: Judy earned money for her college education by slinging hash in a fast-food restaurant during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 朱蒂夏季在快餐店里端盘子赚上大学的学费。

sentences.english: You take food from one dish on the table.
sentences.chinese: 你从桌上的一个盘子里拿些食物。

sentences.english: Then I rake my arm across the drainboard and send the dishes to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 然后我用胳膊把滴水板上的盘子通通扫到地板上。

sentences.english: She reproved the maid in an angry voice for breaking the dish.
sentences.chinese: 她对打碎盘子的女仆大声叱喝。

sentences.english: Lay a sheet of aluminium foil over the pan.
sentences.chinese: 在盘子上盖一层铝箔纸。

sentences.english: Nanon carried off the plate with the eggshells.
sentences.chinese: 拿侬把盛蛋壳的盘子端走。

sentences.english: The girl only laughed and ran off to fetch some more dishes.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘只是笑笑，跑出去继续端盘子。

sentences.english: Would this flatware set go with the china I bought yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 这套盘子跟我昨天买的瓷器相衬吗？

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
